comments:
Build ID: I20070621-1340

Steps To Reproduce:
1.  Get Europa CDT
2.  Install P4WSAD - This works fine!
3.  Install Mylyn
4.  Exit
5.  Restart eclipse and Perforce plugin cannot be initialized


More information:
I've been using Europa CDT with the Perforce Plugin; this works fine till I installed Mylyn.

Since, the installation of mylyn, Eclipse won't start.  The log file contains the the error & stack trace given at the end of this msg.

When I manually remove the plugin (remove the dirs for P4wsad in features & plugins), Eclipse Europa w/Mylyn starts up.

Removing Mylyn from within Eclipse did not fix this... I had to reinstall CDT.

Whatever in Mylyn breaks P4WSAD... it maybe that Perforce needs to publish a new plugin for Mylyn, but it does not appear to be the Eclipse platform but Mylyn itself.

BTW: I did search CDT newsgroups, google for Mylyn & P4WSAD + bugzilla - no mention of this nor if this is a Mylyn configuration.

Regards,
Sheshadri

Unfortunately it is impossible for us to debug this on the Mylyn end because we do not have access to the Perforce source code.  It is not clear what Mylyn could be doing to prevent Perforce from initializing correctly, but the root of the problem is most likely in the Perforce code visible below.  Could you please submit this as a bug to Perforce, and stick a link to the corresponding URL in case anyone else encounters this problem?
